text:
#coronavirusuk #covid19 #coronavirus 
Given this - why not in uk closely support self-isolators to reduce ICU admissions. Don't leave unsupported for 7 days. Use telemedicine to check up on them. Provide a pulse oximeter - if 02 says drop then immediate #chloroquine or #kaletra https://t.co/o1ywwXu2v2
